discord.warning: I'm an active member of a few Discord communities, and I am always open for new conversations and meeting new people!

home.pageDescription: Your average autistic compeer discovering solace in the intricate workings of philosophy and the binary labyrinth of computer science.

introduction.description: Software developer on the autism spectrum passionate about {areas}

biography.title: Biography
biography.text: Hi there! I'm a Brazilian high-schooler with a passion for exploring the intricacies of various fields, including computer science, philosophy, physics, mathematics, and linguistics. I was fascinated by technology from a young age and started my journey with my first computer at the age of three. As I've grown, I've also developed a deep interest in self-development and understanding the complexities of the human existence and the universe we live.
